EmailTemplate.name: Global English - Marketing Communications Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Marketing Communications Request Requires Changes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} :
The “name of collateral” does not follow the DuPont Brand Identity Standards. To be compliant, please make these changes:
· xxxx
· xxxx
· xxxx
Amy J. Hurff DuPont Corporate Communications Brand Specialist 302-996-8361 amy.j.hurff@dupont.com
